title: Bronx apartments for rent.  No waiting.  Affordable,  New appliances
posting_body: ['BRONX NO BROKER FEE APARTMENTS', 'B', 'RONX', 'in most neighborhoods are now renting Cozy Studios renting from $1,000, One Bedroom renting from $1,100, two bedrooms renting from $1650, three bedrooms renting from $2000, and low income renting from $800.', 'These are', 'NO BROKER FEE', 'apartments close to transportations.', 'Most apartments are newly renovated with wood floors, tiled Bathroom with a Tub.', 'Three Walk-in Closets on average, Oversize Bedrooms with Double Windows.', 'Enjoy the Conveniences of a Live-In Super in most buildings.', 'Heat & Hot Water are included in some units.', 'Cat & dog friendly in some buildings.', 'Check out our <URL> for free leads or visit', 'WWW.NYCURBANAPARTMENTS.COM', 'Vouchers, Low credit scores, low income are ok in some units.', 'But that will depend on management and requirements may vary.', 'We help our clients get connected to no-fee owners.', '- Students', '- Pet friendly', '- No credit/Low credit ok with guarantor', "(Don't have a guarantor?", "\xa0 Don't worry.", '\xa0 We can help you get one)', 'TO GET STARTED YOU MUST MAKE A VIRTUAL OR IN-PERSON APPOINTMENT.', 'WALK-INS OK', 'VISIT',
